synopsis.text: World Heroes' Mission, the popular anime movie from the Boku no Hero Academia franchise, has an exciting addition to its PLUS ULTRA Blu-ray and DVD release. The bonus animation, titled 'No.XXX Hawks: SOOTHE', is an adaptation of a special one-shot manga chapter that was initially given out as a gift to moviegoers during the film's theatrical run in select Japanese and American theaters. This exclusive OVA offers a deeper dive into the world of Hawks, providing fans with a unique perspective on the beloved character. The animation was also screened in select theaters in Japan for a limited time, further adding to its allure. Don't miss out on this thrilling addition to the Boku no Hero Academia universe!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
